name: Wordle 3
description:
Wordle 3 is the continuation of the Wordle series, featuring 15 new categories and a new mode handwriting input.
  • The number of starting tips has been increased to 50.
  • new categories: TEXTILE, HYGIENE, STATIONERY, SIZE, HEALTH, COOKING, SPACE, FOOD, OLYMPIC GAMES, BODY, BEVERAGES, APPEARANCE, EMOTIONS, FLOWERS, COUNTRIES.
Well train your head, good game!
